name: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming language, including variables, data types, loops, and functions.

name: Web Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
description: Master the basics of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build interactive websites and web applications.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Discover the principles of machine learning and how to apply them to solve real-world problems using Python and scikit-learn.

name: Graphic Design Essentials
description: Learn essential graphic design principles, tools, and techniques using industry-standard software like Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.

name: Financial Planning and Wealth Management
description: Understand the basics of financial planning, investment strategies, and wealth management to secure your financial future.

name: Spanish for Beginners
description: Start your journey to learn Spanish with this beginner-friendly course. Master vocabulary, grammar, and basic conversation skills.

name: Photography Masterclass
description: Unlock the secrets of photography and improve your skills with this comprehensive masterclass. Learn about composition, lighting, and editing techniques.

name: Digital Marketing Strategies
description: Explore the world of digital marketing and learn how to create effective strategies for social media, email campaigns, SEO, and more.

name: Yoga and Meditation for Beginners
description: Start your journey to wellness with this beginner-friendly course on yoga and meditation. Improve flexibility, reduce stress, and find inner peace.

name: Cooking Basics: From Knife Skills to Flavor Pairing
description: Master the basics of cooking with this comprehensive course. Learn essential techniques, knife skills, and how to pair flavors like a pro chef.

name: Creative Writing Workshop
description: Unleash your creativity and learn the art of storytelling with this engaging creative writing workshop. Develop your voice, style, and narrative skills.

name: English Speaking Mastery
description: Become fluent in English with our comprehensive speaking course. Practice conversation, pronunciation, and fluency techniques.
